entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain and ice pellets changing to freezing rain late in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections of the Bay de Verde Peninsula. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
